How does Behja compare to normal renting: How does Behja compare to normal renting?
Behja gives renters the opportunity to p:
Behja gives renters the opportunity to prepare for homeownership
while they rent. Additionally, when you rent with Behja,
you get the following benefits over a traditional rental:

Ability to save towards a down payment.
Dedicated agents and quality evaluators to ensure
your home is move-in ready.
You can customize your home – paint, landscape,
bring your pets.
All-inclusive dashboard for utility payments, maintenance,
and other facilities management

What's included in the rent price?: What's included in the rent price?
We’re helping you build savings to fund: We’re helping you build savings to fund the mortgage deposit for the apartment, so each rental payment takes that into account.
We will fix the rent for your apartment: We will fix the rent for your apartment for 3 years today.
We give the added benefit of returning b:
We give the added benefit of returning back a portion of this
rent if you take up the option to buy from us.  This “portion” of
rent can be seen as behja’s contribution to your future house
purchase.
Our aim is to make this “rent-pay-back”:
Our aim is to make this “rent-pay-back” (similar to savings) to be
5-10%* of the pre-agreed future price (in 3yrs time) of the 
apartment.  *We will fix this amount and let you know what it is
prior to you finalising the Behja agreement.

and effectively gives you a foot on the property ladder today.)
